verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said;<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H7378>contend<s%> you <S%H854>before<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and let the <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> you, O <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H7379>controversy,<s%> and you <S%H386>strong<s%> <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he will <S%H3198>plead<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> to you? and <S%H4100>wherein<s%> have I <S%H3811>wearied<s%> you? <S%H6030>testify<s%> against me.

For I <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam.<s%>

O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3289>consulted,<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him from <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

With <S%H4100>which<s%> shall I <S%H6923>come<s%> <S%H6924>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3721>bow<s%> myself before the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> shall I <S%H6923>come<s%> <S%H6924>before<s%> him with <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, with <S%H5695>calves<s%> of a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old?<s%>

Will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> or with <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H8081>oil?<s%> shall I <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> for my <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of my <S%H990>body<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul?<s%>

He has <S%H5046>showed<s%> you, O <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> does the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> of you, but to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justly,<s%> and to <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6800>humbly<s%> with your <S%H430>God?<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7121>cries<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the man of <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> you the <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H3259>appointed<s%> it.

Are there <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and the <S%H7332>scant<s%> <S%H374>measure<s%> that is <S%H2194>abominable?<s%>
Shall I count them <S%H2135>pure<s%> with the <S%H7562>wicked<s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> and with the <S%H3599>bag<s%> of <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H68>weights?<s%>

For the <S%H6223>rich<s%> men thereof are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Therefore <S%H1571>also<s%> will I make you <S%H2470>sick<s%> in <S%H5221>smiting<s%> you, in making you <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> but not be <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> and your <S%H3445>casting<s%> down shall be in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you; and you shall <S%H5253>take<s%> <S%H5253>hold,<s%> but shall not <S%H6403>deliver;<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H6403>deliver<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> up to the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

You shall <S%H2232>sow,<s%> but you shall not <S%H7114>reap;<s%> you shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> the <S%H2132>olives,<s%> but you shall not <S%H5480>anoint<s%> you with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> and <S%H8492>sweet<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> but shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

For the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> are <S%H8104>kept,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> and you <S%H3212>walk<s%> in their <S%H4156>counsels;<s%> that I should <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof an <S%H8322>hissing:<s%> therefore you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
